com.brashmonkey.spriter

Class CCDResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brashmonkey.spriter.IKResolver
      • com.brashmonkey.spriter.CCDResolver

  • public class CCDResolver
extends IKResolver
    An inverse kinematics resolver implementation. An instance of this class uses the CCD (Cyclic Coordinate Descent) algorithm to resolve the constraints.
    See Also:
    ccd-algorithm and cyclic-coordinate-descent-in-2d .

      • resolve

        public void resolve(float x,
                    float y,
                    int chainLength,
                    Mainline.Key.BoneRef effectorRef)
        Description copied from class: IKResolver
        Resolves the inverse kinematics constraint with a specific algtorithm
        Specified by:
        resolve in class IKResolver
        Parameters:
        x - the target x value
        y - the target y value
        chainLength - number of parents which are affected
        effectorRef - the actual effector where the resolved information has to be stored in.
